section_title: Progress on the implementation of Decision 1/CP.10 (Buenos Aires Programme of Work)
sentences: This issue was first taken up in the SBI plenary on 15 May.
It was subsequently considered in a joint SBI/SBSTA forum operating as a contact group on issues related to response measures, (see page 15).
Matters related to LDCs: This issue (FCCC/SBI/2012/7) was first considered by the SBI plenary on 14 May.
LEG Chair Pepetua Latasi (Tuvalu) reported on the LEG s work.
The issue was subsequently considered in informal consultations facilitated by Colin Beck (Solomon Islands).
He reported that the group met twice and discussed the LEG work programme for 2011-2012.
Bangladesh, for the G-77/China, stressed that additional resources should be mobilized for the implementation of NAPAs in LDCs.
